sentence.text: Look, Gary!
sentence.textCn: 瞧，加里！

sentence.text: That policeman's waving to you.
sentence.textCn: 那个警察正朝你挥手呢。

sentence.text: He wants you to stop.
sentence.textCn: 他要你停下来。

sentence.text: Where do you think you are?
sentence.textCn: 你认为你现在是在哪儿？

sentence.text: On a race track?
sentence.textCn: 在赛车道上吗？

sentence.text: You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.
sentence.textCn: 你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车。

sentence.text: I can't have been.
sentence.textCn: 我不会开得那样快的。

sentence.text: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.
sentence.textCn: 我是以每小时80英里的速度赶上你的。

sentence.text: Didn't you see the speed limit?
sentence.textCn: 难道你没看见限速牌吗？

sentence.text: I'm afraid I didn't, officer.
sentence.textCn: 恐怕我没有看见，警官。

sentence.text: I must have been dreaming.
sentence.textCn: 我一定是思想开小差了。

sentence.text: He wasn't dreaming, officer.
sentence.textCn: 警官，他思想没有开小差。

sentence.text: I was telling him to drive slowly.
sentence.textCn: 我刚才正告诉他开慢点。

sentence.text: That's why I didn't see the sign.
sentence.textCn: 所以我才没看见那牌子。

sentence.text: Let me see your driving licence.
sentence.textCn: 让我看一看你的驾驶执照。

sentence.text: I won't charge you this time.
sentence.textCn: 这次我就不罚你款了。

sentence.text: But you'd better not do it again!
sentence.textCn: 但你最好不要再开得这样快。

sentence.text: Thank you.
sentence.textCn: 谢谢您。

sentence.text: I'll certainly be more careful.
sentence.textCn: 我以后一定会多加注意。

sentence.text: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.
sentence.textCn: 加里，我刚才叫你开慢点吧。

sentence.text: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.
sentence.textCn: 你总是叫我开慢点，亲爱的。

sentence.text: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
sentence.textCn: 好啦，下次你最好还是听从我的劝告吧！
